Package com.backbase.interview.controllers

Class CoursesController

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
com.backbase.interview.controllers.CoursesController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/courses")
public class CoursesController
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
The Class CoursesController. this class handles all requests and constraint rules for the project, the class is able to generate an endpoint for the following cases: create a course and handle exceptions add a user with controlled edge cases deletes a user with edge cases

  • Field Summary

    • addUser

      @PostMapping("/{courseId}/add") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CourseEntity> addUser​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long courseId, @RequestBody UserEntity newUser) throws RecordNotFoundException
      Adds the user. given a user represented as a UserEntity and a valid course Id in the path the method will persist the user

    • removeUser

      @PostMapping("/{courseId}/remove") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CourseEntity> removeUser​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long courseId, @RequestBody UserEntity user) throws RecordNotFoundException
      Removes the user. given a valid UserEntity in the body and a valid course id in the path, this endpoint removes the user.
      Parameters:
      courseId - as part of the url
      user - as a UserEntity
      Returns:
      the response entity
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException
      RecordNotFoundException
